# User Story
## Description
As a **[user role]**, I want **[feature or functionality]** so that **[reason or benefit]**.


## Assumptions
- Include any technical considerations, dependencies, or constraints.


## Acceptance Criteria:
- [ ] Clear, testable conditions that must be met for the story to be considered complete.
- [ ] Additional criteria.
